text: Booth Gardner (August 21, 1936 â€“ March 15, 2013) was an American politician. He was the 19th governor of the U.S. state of Washington between 1985 and 1993. He also was the ambassador of the GATT. He was a Democrat. Gardner died at his home in Tacoma, Washington on March 15, 2013, of Parkinson's disease. He was 76. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Deaths from Parkinson's disease Category:Governors of Washington (state) Category:Businesspeople from Washington (state) Category:Politicians from Tacoma, Washington Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Booth Gardner
